1: <pb/><t>Ix yalanxi vin̈aj Eliú chi' icha tic:</t>
2: <t>A ex jelan ex, ex e c'ayb'ejnac, ab'ec tas ol vala':</t>
3: <t>A yol co ti' a tz'ab'an svach'il tastac scab'lej. Icha pax chi' co chiquin a tz'ab'an tastac tz'alchaji.</t>
4: <t>Yuj chi' sco b'eyc'olej tas yaj juntzan̈ lolonel tic, yic snachajel cuuj tas yaji.</t>
5: <t>A vin̈aj Job ix alan icha tic: A in tic malaj in mul, palta a Dios max b'oanel-laj tas vaji.</t>
6: <t>Q'uinaloc tato svala' to ay in mul, van am vesan syal chi'. Vach'chom malaj in mul chi', palta max yiq'uel-laj in yaelal tic, xchi vin̈.</t>
7: <t>Malaj junoc mach lajan yed' vin̈aj Job tic, scomon b'uchvaj vin̈ d'a Dios icha co comon uc'an a a'.</t>
8: <t>Scha val sc'ol vin̈ junn̈ej tz'aj yed' eb' chuc. Junn̈ej tz'ec' vin̈ yed' eb' anima chuc spensar.</t>
9: <t>Syalan vin̈ to malaj tas scac' ganar ayic vach' scutej co b'a d'a sat Dios.</t>
10: <t>Palta a ex ay e pensar tic, ab'ec tas ol vala'. A Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, malaj b'aj sc'ulej tas man̈ tojoloc.</t>
11: <t>A tz'ac'an spac d'a junjun anima icha tastac sc'ulej. Junjun mach ol scha spac icha val d'a smojalil.</t>
12: <t>Val yel a Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil chi', malaj b'aj sc'ulej junoc chucal, ma junoc tas man̈ tojoloc.</t>
13: <t>Malaj junoc mach ix ac'an yopisio yac'an yajalil d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic.</t>
14: <t>Q'uinaloc syal sc'ol Dios syiq'uel quic' yac'nacoch d'ayon̈,</t>
15: <t>junlajann̈ej am tz'aj co cham co masanil, tzon̈ meltzajxicanoch pococal.</t>
16: <t>Mamin Job, tato ay a pensar, ab' tas ol vala'. Tza maclej val ab' in lolonel tic.</t>
17: <t>Q'uinaloc tato man̈ tojoloc Dios ¿tom syal yac'an Yajalil? ¿Tom tza nib'ej tzac'och d'a yib'an̈ Dios, jun yelxo val ec'b'al te vach'?</t>
18: <t>Tato chuc syutej sb'a eb' rey yed' eb' yajal, max xivlaj Dios yalanoch d'a sat eb'.</t>
19: <t>A Dios max yac'ochlaj sb'a yed' eb' yajal, max yac'paxochlaj sb'a yed' eb' b'eyum d'a yichan̈ eb' meb'a'. Lajann̈ej quelc'och d'a sat, yujto a b'ojinac on̈ co masanil.</t>
20: <t>Tato syal sc'ol Dios, elan̈chamel tzon̈ cham d'a junoc ac'val. A eb' te jelan yalani, munil ol cham eb', man̈ yovaliloc anima ol milan eb'.</t>
21: <t>A Dios tz'ilan tastac sco b'eyb'alej, yojtacpaxi tastac tz'aj co b'eyeq'ui.</t>
22: <t>Vach'chom te q'uic'q'uinal, palta max yal-laj sc'ub'anel sb'a eb' sc'ulan chucal.</t>
23: <t>A Dios man̈ yovaliloc syavtej junoc anima d'a yichan̈ yic sch'olb'itani.</t>
24: <t>Man̈ yovaliloc sc'anb'ejec' yab'i tas yuj satel eb' nivac yajal, ch'ocxo mach tz'ochcan d'a yopisio eb' chi'.</t>
25: <t>A Dios yojtac tastac sc'ulej eb'. Syaln̈ej sc'och d'ac'valil satancanel eb'.</t>
26: <t>A val d'a quichan̈ tz'ac'jioch syaelal eb', icha tz'utaj eb' chuc,</t>
27: <t>yujto malaj sgana eb' sc'anab'ajan tas syala', malaj sgana eb' sb'eyb'alan schecnab'il.</t>
28: <t>Yuj schucal eb' yajal chi', tz'el yav eb' meb'a' yed' eb' tz'ixtaji. A Dios tz'ab'an yel yav eb' chi'.</t>
29: <t>Q'uinaloc malaj tas syal Dios, malaj mach syal yac'anoch d'a yib'an̈. Q'uinaloc sb'at mican Dios d'a eb' van yixtaji, malaj mach syal scolan eb'. Vach'chom junoc nivan chon̈ab', ma junoc anima, max yal scolan sb'a.</t>
30: <t>An̈ej Dios syal scolvaji yic max yac' yajalil eb' chuc spensar d'a juntzan̈ chon̈ab' chi', yic max ixtaj eb' anima yuj eb'.</t>
31: <t>Mamin Job, tocval ix al d'a Dios: Ix och in mul, palta man̈xo ol in c'ulejlaj.</t>
32: <t>Ch'ox val in mul to maxtzac in nacoti. Tato ay b'aj chuc ix laj vutej in b'a, axo ticnaic, man̈xo ol in c'ulejlaj, man̈ xa chioc.</t>
33: <t>Tato max a cha ab' tas syal Dios, ¿tom a a naani to ol spac Dios d'ayach icha val tas tza nib'ej? Yuj chi' a ach tza na' tas tzutej a b'a, man̈oc in ol val d'ayach. Al val d'ayon̈ tas tza na' chi'.</t>
34: <t>A eb' anima jelan tz'ab'an tas sval tic, ol yal eb' icha tic:</t>
35: <t>Man̈ yojtacoc vin̈aj Job chi' tas syala', malaj yelc'och slolonel vin̈ syal chi', xcham eb'.</t>
36: <t>Chamocab' val sch'olb'itaj vin̈aj Job tic, yujto a tas syal vin̈, lajan icha tas syal eb' malaj svach'il sb'eyb'al.</t>
37: <t>A vin̈aj Job tic, man̈ ton̈ejoc ay smul vin̈, palta yelxo te pit vin̈. Val d'a quichan̈ sb'uchvaj vin̈ d'a Dios, stelan val sb'a vin̈ yed'oc, xchi vin̈aj Eliú chi'.</t>
